mapper.update: update gd_about set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, address, createTime, deleted, ftype, logo, `name`, orderNo, `type`, detail from gd_about
